overview: Tom Krug has over 25 years of experience in delivering state-of-the-art business and technology solutions for Financial Services clients with an emphasis on the Insurance markets. Tom was most recently a Consulting Manager with KMPG Consulting, focused on managing complex engagements for Global Insurance clients reconfiguring their operating environments and deploying computer systems to address emerging business opportunities. He was previously the Chief Technology Officer for Meridian Mutual Insurance Company managing the business process redesign of the Meridian’s Property and Casualty (P&C) insurance operations. Tom has held a variety of senior business and technical positions for some of the worlds largest companies including approximately 18 years with EDS and executive management roles with IBM and Perot Systems. Tom received both his Bachelor of Arts and Master of Science degrees from Ball State University.
